Spells

Spells are special magical abilities in Remixed Pixel Dungeon that can be cast by heroes with magical affinities. Unlike scrolls which are consumed after use, spells can be cast multiple times using skill points (Mana).

Magic Affinities

Different classes have different magic affinities that determine their available spells:

  • Common: Can use spells from spell books only (Heal, Raise Dead, Cloak, Calm, Charm, Town Portal)
  • Elemental: Fire, water, earth, and air-based magic (Ignite, WindGust, Root, FreezeGlobe)
  • Necromancy: Death and undead-themed magic (Raise Dead, Exhumation, Dark Sacrifice, Possess)
  • Combat: Battle-enhancing magic (DieHard, Dash, BodyArmor, Smash)
  • Rogue: Stealth and trickery magic (Cloak, Backstab, KunaiThrow, Haste)
  • Huntress: Nature and creature-summoning magic (Calm, Charm, ShootInEye, Summon Beast)
  • Elf: Natural elemental magic (MagicArrow, Sprout, HideInGrass, NatureArmor)
  • Witchcraft: Gnoll-themed magic (Roar, LightningBolt, Heal, Order)
  • Priest: Divine magic (Heal, Calm, Charm, Order)
  • PlagueDoctor: Disease and toxic magic (Heal, Calm, Charm, Order)
  • Dev: Development spells (TestSpell, CurseItem)

Magic Level and Spell Unlocking

Heroes have a Magic Level attribute that determines which spells they can unlock and how powerful those spells become. Magic Level can be increased with the Tome of Knowledge item.

Spells by Affinity

Common Affinity

  • Town Portal - Return to town
  • Heal - Restore health
  • Raise Dead - Raise a zombie from a corpse
  • Cloak - Brief invisibility
  • Calm - Pacify enemies
  • Charm - Charm enemies

Elemental Affinity

  • Ignite - Set targets on fire
  • Wind Gust - Push enemies and objects away
  • Root - Immobilize enemies
  • Freeze Globe - Freeze enemies in ice

Necromancy Affinity

  • Raise Dead - Raise a zombie from a corpse
  • Exhumation - Exhume a corpse and gain health
  • Dark Sacrifice - Sacrifice health for power
  • Possess - Possess an enemy
  • Curse Item - Curse an item

Combat Affinity

  • Die Hard - Temporary damage resistance
  • Dash - Move quickly to a location
  • Body Armor - Temporary armor enhancement
  • Smash - Powerful area attack

Rogue Affinity

  • Cloak - Brief invisibility
  • Backstab - Powerful attack from behind
  • Kunai Throw - Throw a Kunai at range
  • Haste - Temporary speed boost

Huntress Affinity

  • Calm - Pacify enemies
  • Charm - Charm enemies
  • Shoot In Eye - Powerful ranged attack
  • Summon Beast - Summon a creature to fight for you

Elf Affinity

  • Magic Arrow - Launch a magical arrow at range
  • Sprout - Create a grass tile under yourself
  • Hide In Grass - Hide in grass for stealth
  • Nature Armor - Temporary armor enhancement

Witchcraft Affinity

  • Roar - Terrify nearby enemies
  • Lightning Bolt - Lightning attack at range
  • Heal - Restore health
  • Order - Give orders to friendly units

Priest Affinity

  • Heal - Restore health
  • Calm - Pacify enemies
  • Charm - Charm enemies
  • Order - Give orders to friendly units

Plague Doctor Affinity

  • Heal - Restore health
  • Calm - Pacify enemies
  • Charm - Charm enemies
  • Order - Give orders to friendly units

Strategy

Spells are an efficient way to use magical abilities without consuming limited scroll resources. However, they require mana/skill point management and understanding of your class's magic affinity to use effectively.
